snippet: The BRZ and FR-S are essentially the same small, rear-drive sports car. There are slight variances, but everything that matters is identical and, by the way, mostly terrific.
abstract: Behind the Wheel column review of Subaru BRZ and Scion FR-S sports cars.
lead_paragraph: The BRZ and FR-S are essentially the same small, rear-drive sports car. There are slight variances, but everything that matters is identical and, by the way, mostly terrific.
